Description.description: The description or name of the line item.

Quantity.description: The quantity of the item in the line item.

UnitAmount.description: The unit price or amount for a single item in the line item.

AccountCode.description: The code identifying the account the line item belongs to.

ItemCode.description: The code identifying the specific item in the line item.

LineItemID.description: The unique identifier for the line item.

TaxType.description: The type of tax applied to the line item.

LineAmount.description: The total amount for the line item.

TaxAmount.description: The amount of tax applied to the line item.

DiscountRate.description: The discount rate applied to the line item.

Tracking.description: Custom tracking categories associated with the line item.
